body.name: DEPSTECH 4K Webcam, Ultra HD 1/2.55'' Sony Sensor, 3X Digital Zoom, Dual Noise-Canceling Microphones, Remote Control, Auto Focus, Streaming Webcam for PC, Mac, Laptop, Video Call, Zoom, Skype, Teams
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 21 hrs 26 mins
features: 【4K Resolution & 1/2.55’’ Sony Sensor】 Built-in 4K 30fps ultra hd resolution on this webcam brings sharp clarity picture without lag, always look your best in every online meeting. Upgraded to 1/2.55’’ CMOS sony sensor, the images are clearer and more realistic than before, able to capture lifelike details with excellent dynamic range.

【Remote with 3X Zoom】Easily control your 4k webcam with remote control during video calls, no matter what angle it is in! Support 3X digital zoom in, turn off the webcam, one-key mute, switch auto/fixed focus, exposure/saturation adjustment, mirror and more. Zoom function is available at 1080P resolution and below.

【Dual Noise Canceling Microphones】 DEPSTECH DW49 Pro webcam with microphone greatly enhances the sound quality of your live videos or online calls, maintains high-quality audio output even in noisy environments. It is perfect for online teaching, video conferencing, gaming streaming, video calling.

【Auto Focus & Auto Light Adjustment】The webcam for streaming uses advanced autofocus technology to intelligently capture and focus on your face or object, you never have to worry about adjusting the focal length. It is also equipped with auto light correction function, which enables web camera to adapt to lighting conditions for clear images in low-light environments.

【Wide Compatibility & Type-C Adapter】 DEPSTECH computer camera works with USB A and Type-C input ports with included Adapter. Just plug and play, no additional drivers required, ready to use your webcam in applications such as Zoom, Skype, Youtube, Microsoft Teams, Facetime, Facebook and more. The webcam for laptop is also compatible with Windows XP/7/8/10/11, Mac OS and etc.

【Privacy Cover and Tripod Included】Don't worry about your privacy being leaked, just close the cover to keep your privacy fully protected when the webcam is not in use. You can also mount the usb webcam on the tripod to adjust the height or position you need.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: DEPSTECH DW49 Pro 4K webcam provides clear and smooth video. It is equipped with 3840*2160 resolution 8MP image 1/2.55'' sony sensor and 5-layer high-performance optical lens, built in dual noise canceling microphones, zoom function and more. The 80° view angle lens has a wider field of vision.
The 4K UHD resolution and 8mp display deliver detailed, high-definition and true-to-life images to take your meetings to the next level.

Previous page 1/2.55’’ sony sensor Captures life-like detail and excellent dynamic range. Adjust the brightness by Remote You can get the desired picture quality by adjust the brightness/saturation/contrast Clear Voice Pickup Built-in dual mics with automatic noise-canceling technology allows for clear sound recording. Superior Autofocus Technology DEPSTECH web camera can automatically focus on your face or the object within 3 seconds. Next page 1 Sony Sensor 2 Brightness Adjustment 3 Webcam with Microphone 4 3 x Zoom in 5 Auto Focus
Previous page Next page 1 Video Conference 2 Online Learning 3 Family Video Call 4 Game Streaming 5 Online Teaching

Multiple Ways to Place Webcam Place USB webcam almost anywhere you want. Not only you can makes it easy to mount the streaming webcam on computer external monitors, you also can place the webcam on flat surface with the included tripod. Updated Type-C Connector Easy to set-up, plug and play, no additional driver required. With included Type-C adapter, the laptop webcam is compatible with USB-A as well as Type-C input ports.
1. Please note that the remote control is suitable for 3A batteries, which are not included in the package. 2. Zoom function is available at 1080P resolution and below.

After connecting the webcam into the MacBook Air, do I need to select the Depstech Webcam when opening a video software? Yes, you need to manually select the device named Depstech Webcam. Why can't I use the Zoom function? Zoom function is available at 1080P resolution. Please change the resolution of the video software to 1080P or below. How to disable autofocus? You can click the Auto/Fixed focus button on the remote control to disable the autofocus.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Quality Camera
reviews.reviewText: I Purchased this for my work as i do several video calls a month to my clients. This has a nice crisp display and the sound quality is superb. it was easy to set up and use along with my video program and has 2 options for mounting. either on your screen or via the mini tripod. I will attempt to connect this to a 55" monitor in the very near future for conference calls and will use the tripod as well. The convenience of the remote was nice to make the needed adjustments to zone in on sound and picture. Overall, if you use video calls often, this is a worthy purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Small and perfect for my video chats with friends
reviews.reviewText: I love the webcam. It is crystal clear and also has built in mics so I can use it to talk to friends on discord and also use it for work on zoom meetings. The auto focus is superb and works quickly to refocus the video whenever you move around or move closer to the camera. I highly recommend this camera and would definitely buy again. The only downside to this is that I wish it has built in lights into the front. But at this pricepoint I cannot complain. Exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was super easy to set up and works great for my desk so that I don't have to open my laptop to utilize the camera. The stand is very adaptable and does a great job of holding the camera in place.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good value for the money
reviews.reviewText: I replaced the 1080 version of this camera with this new 4K model. Provided a better pictures and some other new features that may be helpful to some people. For the price, it provides a better image than what you get built in with most laptops.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value Webcam!!
reviews.reviewText: I use this camera for my work meetings and it works great! It auto focuses very quickly and does the job! High quality for the price. A+

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Plug and play
reviews.reviewText: This webcam has a number of useful features and thus far I have not had any issues using it. The tripod is basic but is stable and does the job. I like the fact that the webcam is plug and play, as I'm restricted from installing software on my work computer. The cable is sufficiently long for my applications (approx. 70"). Decals are included but are not very useful if the lens cover is installed. Picture is ok, but as others have noted, it can be a bit washed out. Much better with good light and can be improved using controls on the remote. Compared to my current set up, which lacks a tripod and is glitchy with some applications, this webcam is a huge improvement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Been looking for a good 4K webcam
reviews.reviewText: Very nice webcam. Used Desptech products in the past and they never disappoint. They do give coupons from time to time on the amazon page making these even more affordable. Easy to setup and comes with many accessories, everything needed for home office setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect image and packed with useful accessories
reviews.reviewText: The camera is great for my needs. I had a Razer light camera that broke and this one is a perfect replacement. Comes with two kinds of us connectors so I don't need a hub. Also, the image is great and the included mic is exactly what I needed.

reviews.reviewTitle: Une webcam 4k avec contrôle à distance vraiment pratique et performante 👍
reviews.reviewText: Conforme à la description cette webcam 4k est de bonne qualité, livré avec son petit trépied très pratique, elle dispose également d'un petit cache «vie privée» à refermer lorsqu'elle n'est pas utilisé.Contrôlable à distance grâce à sa télécommande, elle offre une belle qualité d'image, avec une mise au point automatique et un son très correct.Pour 75.99€ moins un coupon de 10€ au moment de mon commentaire, on a un rapport qualité prix correct.Merci de m'avoir lu 😉

Eccellente!!Web Cam per PC con microfono, veramente eccezionale. Ha una risoluzione ultra chiara dell'immagine, si può controllare a distanza con l'apposito telecomando e offre la correzione automatica della luminosità.Assicura anche la riduzione del rumore e lo Zoom ottico. Ha doppio microfono con eventuale cancellazione del rumore, dunque é un ottimo dispositivo per garantire la privacy.In dotazione ha un pratico treppiede per una migliore e ideale posizione della web Cam.Ottimo rapporto qualità prezzo perché davvero eccellente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The box seals were already broken on arrival so if this had not been a "Vine" review product I would have sent it back as having been tampered with. Fortunately, everything was intact and complete and the camera was plug-and-play. My monitor is 4K so I can confirm that this 4K camera does deliver very crisp, well-produced images for my video conferencing which is mainly in "Zoom". Autofocus was unable to make it's mind up when the camera was sitting on top of my monitor but this can be switched off from the very nicely featured remote control which does not come with batteries. The remote gives control over zoom, colour saturation, brightness, microphone mute, image on/off, mirror, and contrast. There is also a tripod included, along with a lens cover if you want to use it although my security software deals with webcam access. The only compromise is that this is running at 30 frames per second rather than 60. 30fps reduces the data load required. This is understandable when you consider that this is designed to send images in real time over broadband but 30fps is at the bottom end of the human eye's perception of image flicker. Not that you can see it I hasten to add. The camera's field of view is just right and my head and shoulders filled the frame beautifully - the advantage of having a zoom facility. I am told the microphones are outstanding too but I can not personally verify that because I was not on the receiving end but I trust the source of that comment. A Sony chip is running things and they know about video from their range of SLR cameras and camcorders. Recommended.

The DEPSTECH DW49 Pro Webcam 4K has truly redefined my video communication experience, delivering exceptional clarity, innovative features, and an effortless user experience. Titled as a "3X Zoomable Webcam with Microphone and Remote," this webcam lives up to its promises, making it a standout choice for anyone seeking professional-grade video quality for PC, Mac, streaming, video calls, and conferences.The "4K" resolution of this webcam is a game-changer, providing crystal-clear video quality that elevates my online interactions. Whether participating in virtual meetings, streaming content, or engaging in video calls with friends and family, the DEPSTECH DW49 Pro Webcam consistently delivers sharp and vibrant visuals, creating an immersive and lifelike experience.The "3X Zoom" capability adds a layer of versatility to the webcam, allowing users to focus on specific details or adjust the framing according to their needs. This feature enhances the overall flexibility of the webcam, catering to various scenarios, from professional presentations to personal video chats.The "1/2.55" Sony Sensor" is a testament to the webcam's commitment to superior image quality. The larger sensor size ensures excellent light sensitivity, capturing detailed and well-balanced visuals even in challenging lighting conditions. This is particularly beneficial for users who may not always have access to ideal lighting setups.Equipped with "Dual Noise-Canceling Mics," the DEPSTECH DW49 Pro Webcam ensures clear and crisp audio during video calls. The noise-canceling technology minimizes background distractions, allowing for seamless communication without the interference of ambient sounds.The "Autofocus" feature contributes to the overall ease of use. The webcam intelligently adjusts focus, ensuring that users remain sharp and clear throughout their video sessions. This eliminates the need for manual adjustments, providing a hassle-free experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This 4K webcam from DEPSTECH supports 30fps video and the video quality generated by this webcam is very impressive, the picture is clear and crisp and very vibrant. A remote control is also included, which is a nice touch, and this enable the control of functions such as the 3x zoom.A feature that sometimes gets overlooked with webcams is audio quality, and I'm pleased to say that this webcam captures wonderfully crisp and clean audio thanks to its built-in dual noise cancelling microphones, which makes a big difference.The webcam uses USB-C but also has an adaptor for the older USB-A connections, which is useful. Overall this is a very high quality 4K webcam.
